docs.lead_paragraph: Mary West stumbled across YourGrocer.com, an online grocery store, one afternoon a few years ago and quickly became a fan of its fresh blueberry muffins and fast deliveries. Ordering her groceries by computer made Ms. West like any other shopper, and for this she was grateful. Now, Ms. West, who is blind, does not stand out the way she once did in D'Agostino's or Gristede's.

headline.main: Online Deliveries Lighten Burden for the Disabled; Empowerment, Not Just Convenience, For an Unexpected Class of Consumer

docs.abstract: Article discusses how online services that deliver groceries and other goods have become blessings to disabled; photo (M)

docs.lead_paragraph: With the rate of Caesarean sections on the rise, a leading group of obstetricians has issued guidelines that may reduce the number of operations. This month, the federal Centers for Disease Control and Prevention announced that, for the third year in a row, surgically assisted deliveries were up, after a period of decline that began in 1989.
docs.abstract: American College of Obstetricians and Gynecologists, responding to renewed increase in Caesarean sections, suggests steps hospitals can take to cut number of such operations and spur vaginal deliveries (S)

docs.lead_paragraph: To the Editor: Re ''Medical Schools Discover Value in Dispensing Compassion'' (Aug. 22): The Albert Einstein College of Medicine was onto this in the 1980's.
docs.abstract: Dr L Jane Macdonnell letter on Aug 22 article hails Albert Einstein College of Medicine's early interest in human aspect of medicine
docs.snippet: To the Editor:    Re ''Medical Schools Discover Value in Dispensing Compassion'' (Aug. 22): The Albert Einstein College of Medicine was onto this in the 1980's.

docs.lead_paragraph: The California Children and Families Commission is beginning a review to find its first agency of record to handle its educational advertising campaign focused on early childhood development and the effects of tobacco use by pregnant women and parents of young children. Billings were estimated at $90 million for a three-year contract.

headline.main: Family Panel Seeks Agency of Record
